gpt_comment: The day in Brussels looks promising with average temperatures around 25.8°C, peaking at 31°C, and a comfortable low of 19°C. There's no rain on the horizon, making it a perfect day for outdoor activities. Just remember to carry a hat, the sun will be out in full swing!
